sect1.title: What is Spring Actionscript?
sect1.para: Spring ActionScript is an offshoot of the Java-based Spring Framework written in ActionScript 3. It is targeted for the Flash, Flex and AIR platforms. The framework contains an extremely versatile Inversion of Control Container, a metadata handling system, a micro MVC library and extensions for the Cairngorm and PureMVC frameworks. The container may be configured with XML, MXML, metadata or actionscript, or even a combination of these.
